page.title: 07LOCAL EVENTS IN ELSWICK
page.content: For the{Elswick Festival}they had a bouncy castle, a mini hoppings, grass sledging,scoop the duck,gymnastics and a raffle stall.They played "It's a Knockout" and each team made a joker which was held up when they wanted to play a certain game. One game was called{"Hit the Head".}You put seven people into a dinghy and paddled up the pool until you were in a throwing position.When the heads were knocked down you were pulled back and the first team to get back were the winners. In a game called{"Fill the {Pot"}you got buckets, some cups and a dinghy. You paddled up the pool and while you were paddling you filled the buckets with water by using the cups. The water was then put into a container at the end of the pool, measured and the team with most water won the contest.
